'''Mob Vote Skin Pack 2022'''<ref>{{Tweet|Minecraft|1579909969968701440|Dress up as the rascal, sniffer, or tuff golem and support your favorite Mob Vote pick! #MinecraftLive}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] consisting of 12 skins of four characters dressed up as the mobs featured in the [[Minecraft Live 2022#Mob Vote|2022 Mob vote]]. At some point, it was delisted.
